Reviews.Title: Very nice setup.
Reviews.Author: tweet
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Picture quality is good day or night. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because you cannot view the cameras on a Macbook. It works fine though my Ipad, my daughter's Iphone, and my Android phone....but not on a Macbook. This is due to lack of support of ActiveX.Other than that, it's a great product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cost benefit product.
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Acosta
Reviews.Content: Elegant presentation. Very sharp image. Easy to handle standsalone and client software monitoring. Works out of the box. Bought 2 of these.

Reviews.Title: Its for outdoor only inside store or home is black and white
Reviews.Author: jey
Reviews.Content: I already had camara system installed with 4 camaras I wanted 8 camaras so I bough this one I only installed one of Samsung camara to check the result all I got is black and white result when u open back kitchen door sun light comes in and its go color when u shut the door back to black and white its need lots of lights to stay color otherwise it will go black and white , my existing camaras stay color with the same light  and samsang don't. I called samsang they said I have to install this camaras close to lights which means u have no preference where you want to install it has to install close to light to get color result. I would recommend this camaras for outside only and when it gets evening time u would lose color and goes to balck and white. I am returning this one and will buy something different which does not go black and white till its all dark :)
